sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; function LightStepA(props) { return (

STEP 1

VHS cornhole pop-up, try-hard 8-bit iceland helvetica. Kinfolk bespoke try-hard cliche palo santo offal.

STEP 2

Vice migas literally kitsch +1 pok pok. Truffaut hot chicken slow-carb health goth, vape typewriter.

STEP 3

Coloring book nar whal glossier master cleanse umami. Salvia +1 master cleanse blog taiyaki.

STEP 4

VHS cornhole pop-up, try-hard 8-bit iceland helvetica. Kinfolk bespoke try-hard cliche palo santo offal.

FINISH

Pitchfork ugh tattooed scenester echo park gastropub whatever cold-pressed retro.

); } LightStepA.defaultProps = { theme: 'indigo' }; LightStepA.propTypes = { theme: PropTypes.string.isRequired }; export default LightStepA;
